name: nutritionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to nutrition (= the substances that you take into your body as food and the way that they influence your health): So many snack foods are bad for you, nutritionally speaking. The school always tries to provide nutritionally balanced meals.
More examplesFewer examplesThere have been conflicting reports about whether this food is good or bad for you nutritionally.Nutritionally, potatoes contain a lot of carbohydrate, as well as vitamin C, B vitamins, potassium, and iron.The term "superfood" was invented to describe foods that are nutritionally rich.
